attributes.action: No 2.8% payrise for all MPs and parties
attributes.background:
If the 🇬🇧 is in that much debt 
You have to cut 
Elderlys heating tax 
Putting council tax up when you promised you would freeze it
You change elections to keep in power
And hurting the farmers 
The economy has shrunk and has no growth 
You in government shouldn't get a payrise

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 
 
You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
